TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EasingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義模式，衍生自 的類別會用該模式執行其 easing。

span.span: Defines the modes in which classes derived from perform their easing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列圖表示範不同的值，其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。The following graphs demonstrate the different values of , where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time. ![BackEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode 圖形。")![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.") ![BounceEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode 圖形。")![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CircleEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode 圖形。")![CircleEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CubicEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode 圖形。")![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.") ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。")![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。")![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.") ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuadraticEase](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuadraticEase")![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes") ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuinticEase。](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuinticEase。")![QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![使用不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase")![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseIn = int32(0)

summary.span: 插補會遵循以緩動函式產生關聯的數學公式。

span.span: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseInOut = int32(2)

summary.span: 插補會對前半段的動畫使用 ，並對後半段的動畫使用 。

span.span: Interpolation uses for the first half of the animation and for the second half.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseOut = int32(1)

summary.span: 插補會遵循 100% 插補減去以緩動函式產生關聯之公式輸出的規則。

span.span: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
